ygData.subject: Re: Lifetap line of spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes at the time I was 40 I just haven t seen any resists at all on any mob although I keep hearing it. Naeeldar ... From: Fraal  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Yes at the time I was 40 I just haven't seen any resists at all on any mob although I keep hearing it.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Fraal <mata_eq@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, November 05, 1999 11:23 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Lifetap line of spells


Well since you are 45th then yeah your gonna do full dmg w/ lifetap spells, since 5 lvls above you is 51 .. .

----- Original Message -----
From: Dark
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 9:57 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Lifetap line of spells


I heard this too but I've been playing nonstop the past week and a half
trying to get to 46 so I can go into PoH and PoF and every single time my
spell has done full damage.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Aazen1@... <Aazen1@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, November 04, 1999 7:20 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Lifetap line of spells


>From: Aazen1@...
>
>I have heard (read a post at CastersRealm) that now our Lifetap spells have
>had their resistance rate raised a by a LOT. Before they were pretty much
>unresistable.Now they are supposed to be as bad as the Darkness line of
>spells.I have been away from EQ for several days so I can not say if this
is
>true or not, I intend to see for myself today.If this IS true than this is
>complete BS! I mean, us Necros are being hit left and right by these stupid
>patches.They powered down our high level pets, weakened our DOTs, and now
>THIS?! I mean come on! What does Verant have against us?
>
>The possibly soon to be deleted Necromancer,
>Aazen SyVex
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
